page.title: 09POINT TO POINT
page.content: The annual Point to Point which is held at{BADBURY RINGS}is a sport purely for{pleasure,}although there are prizes.This is a good way of advertising because you can sponsor a fence or race.Many owners go to try out new horses or to train horses to race over large distances.Most of the owners come for sport or to show off new horses.Alot of people come in big caravan type stalls to sell sweets or alcohol to race watchers.There is the occasional merry person but no real drunks!The{point to point}is much fun for all the family{. { }
